paper_abstract: This paper discusses a priori error analysis of a C-0 discontinuous Galerkin method (CDG) for Kirchhoff plates (cf. [17]). With the help of error estimates of a L-2 orthogonal projection operator and an interpolation operator due to [1,13], we obtain the error estimate for the CDG method in energy norm, following the technique in [6]. The error estimate in H-1 norm is also offered via the duality argument. Several numerical results are performed to support the theory obtained.
paper_title: Error analysis of a C-0 discontinuous Galerkin method for Kirchhoff plates
